name: Twitter (2022) - for "Dim" background theme
description:
Makes the UI responsive, more web app like and wider.

Left column navigation displays icons only.

Wider feed with a darker background.

And more...
additional_info:
https://twitter.com/i/display
- Requires Dim Background
- Viewed best using Middle Font Size

v0.2.2 (9-22-22)
- Show notification count.

v0.2.2 (3-6-21)
- Minor alignment updates.

v0.2.19 (12-22-20)
- Body overflow scroll auto removed.

v0.2.18 (7-24-20)
- Support for fixed video overlay.

v0.2.17 (7-21-20)
- Overflow issue affecting right column fixed.
- Body overflow scroll set to auto.
- Avatar info hidden.

v0.2.16 (7-19-20)
- Screenshot updated.
- Messages popup fix.
- Avatar name positioning updated.
- Messages icon positioning updated.

v0.2.15 (10-14-19)
- Profile photo size fix.

v0.2.14 (10-03-19)
- Messages width fix.

v0.2.13 (08-20-19)
- Top bar background added.

v0.2.12 (08-19-19)
- Compatibility fixes.
- Feed max width reduced to 800px.
- Darker feed background color.

v0.2.11 (08-08-19)
- "Follows you" fix

v0.2.1 (07-24-19)
- Improved Compose Tweet width for smaller screen sizes.

v0.2.0 (07-24-19)
- Expanded support for all pages.

v0.1.1 (07-24-19)
- New tweet area is no longer fixed position.
